/bin/c++ -g CMakeFiles/build_hierarchical_db.dir/build_hierarchical_db.cpp.o CMakeFiles/build_hierarchical_db.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o build_hierarchical_db   -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib: libgpu_kmer_database.a -lcudart -lcuda -lstdc++fs -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
